description_1: The Hotel Manaíra is located a few meters from the beach, on one of the city's main avenues, close to shopping malls, boutiques, bars and restaurants. With a contemporary, sophisticated and careful concept, our details transform each accommodation into a unforgettable experience to make your visit even more pleasant
list_1_1: The 25% discount will be applied in the Superior category;
list_1_2: The discount is not cumulative with other promotions;
list_1_3: It is necessary to inform that you want the COBEP event discount;
list_1_6: Reservation via phone/whatsapp (83) 3021-9704 or email reservas@hotelmanaira.com.br.
description_2: Inaugurated in 2018 as the first design hotel in João Pessoa, the LS Hotel combines luxury, comfort and exclusivity in a high-end project, where the combination of design and hospitality launches a unique concept in accommodation in the capital of Paraíba. Discover the refinement of our structure and the attractiveness of our services, the experience of staying at the LS Hotel will surely surprise you.
